Imports

httpx/parser, ioselectors

Types

HttpxDefect = ref object of Defect
OnRequest = proc (req: Request): Future[void] {....gcsafe, gcsafe.}
Request = object
  selector: Selector[Data]
  client*: SocketHandle
  start: int
  requestID: uint

Settings = object
  port*: Port
  bindAddr*: string
  numThreads: int
  startup: Startup

Procs

proc forget(req: Request) {....raises: [], tags: [].}

Unregisters the underlying request's client socket from httpx's event loop.

This is useful when you want to register req.client in your own event loop, for example when wanting to integrate httpx into a websocket library.

func headers(req: Request): Option[HttpHeaders] {....raises: [KeyError], tags: [].}
Parses the request's data to get the headers. 
func httpMethod(req: Request): Option[HttpMethod] {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [].}
Parses the request's data to find the request HttpMethod.

    ...raises: [], tags: [].}

func ip(req: Request): string {....raises: [], tags: [].}
Retrieves the IP address that the request was made from. 
func path(req: Request): Option[string] {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [].}
Parses the request's data to find the request target. 
proc run(onRequest: OnRequest) {.inline, ...raises: [Exception, OSError,
    ValueError, KeyError], tags: [RootEffect, WriteIOEffect, ReadIOEffect,
                                  TimeEffect].}

Starts the HTTP server with default settings. Calls onRequest for each request.

See the other run proc for more info.

proc run(onRequest: OnRequest; settings: Settings) {.
    ...raises: [Exception, OSError, ValueError, KeyError],
    tags: [RootEffect, WriteIOEffect, ReadIOEffect, TimeEffect].}

Starts the HTTP server and calls onRequest for each request.

The onRequest procedure returns a Future[void] type. But unlike most asynchronous procedures in Nim, it can return nil for better performance, when no async operations are needed.

proc send(req: Request; body: string; code = Http200) {.inline, ...raises: [],
    tags: [].}

Sends a HTTP 200 OK response with the specified body.

Warning: This can only be called once in the OnRequest callback.

proc send(req: Request; code: HttpCode) {....raises: [], tags: [].}
Responds with the specified HttpCode. The body of the response is the same as the HttpCode description. 
proc send(req: Request; code: HttpCode; body: string;
          contentLength: Option[string]; headers = "") {.inline, ...raises: [],
    tags: [].}

Responds with the specified HttpCode and body.

Warning: This can only be called once in the OnRequest callback.

proc unsafeSend(req: Request; data: string) {.inline, ...raises: [], tags: [].}

Sends the specified data on the request socket.

This function can be called as many times as necessary.

It does not check whether the socket is in a state that can be written so be careful when using it.

Templates

template send(req: Request; code: HttpCode; body: string; headers = "")

Responds with the specified HttpCode and body.

Warning: This can only be called once in the OnRequest callback.
